channel.title: career on Tella
channel.description: Recent content in career on Tella

item.title: Errorl Koolmeister: Organizing and Managing an AI Center of Excellence
item.description: Errol Koolmeister is an AI and data advisor at The AI Framework, board member at Speqta, professor at the Lisbon School of Economics and Management, and an Advisory Board Member of the Northwestern University Retail AI Lab.

item.title: Ram Peddu: Charting a Career in AI
item.description: Ram Peddu is the Senior Vice President and Head of Advanced Analytics at Citizens Bank. He is working on intelligent automation, AI/ML solutions, enterprise data lakes, AI governance, and geo spatial analytics.
